Text: Management West Variancesmonth we briefly discussed a variance between the general ledger and the DPR for the management west book I took an action item to provide documentation of where I was seeing the value taken in the DPR back in January Accordingly the liquidation detail for post id is in the attached file titled MGMTWSTJANLIQ The issue is that it appears Deal QO erroneously liquidated in the month of January at a value of when the deal has a March term date and valued correctly in the liquidations for that month creating a duplicate liquidation for the same deal Please review the detail and let me know if you agree that the expense was taken in error by the management west book in Jan or if I have picked up the incorrect post id or if there is some other issue that I hav e missed The only other remaining variances for the management west book relate to Mirant Americas Energy Marketing I have been working with the financia l settlements group to determine the variances between the liquidated value a nd the amount settledthe MGMTWSTMIRANT file summarizes the differences Essentially the liquidated value for deals did not pick up the fixed pri ce deduct values shown in TAGG and one deal with a term date of November through March did not ever liquidate The file has a summary page and then supporting worksheets for each deal listed The net effect if you agree that the adjustments need to be made to the DP R would be expense of for the Mirant Americas Energy items and revenu e of for reversal of the January liquidation on deal QO Pleasecall me on extension if you would like to discuss or if yo u need me to provide additional information Best regards Rachel

Deals with Book Name of UNNYPhillip There are several deals in TAGG with an ENA book name of UNNY examples are N and NC I am trying to find out the long description for the book and where the deal value would be captured Can you help The examples above were set up in and run through Best regards Rachel
